topic.title: Qodana Cloud
topic.p: In case you run %product% in multiple projects or repositories, you can find that it would be good to load and aggregate all inspection reports in a single place, especially if the codebase is distributed across several servers and virtual private networks and each team works independently. This is when a centralized solution for collecting and displaying report information from all %product% instances would come in handy.

%product_cloud% is a cloud-based solution that helps you accumulate various %product% reports and track the progress in your project(s) from a single point: %product% instances automatically forward inspection reports to %product_cloud% based on project tokens.
For more information, see the Qodana Cloud use-cases page.
